inclusion.criterion: Experience ≥ 3 seizures/month in the month prior to starting study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No status epilepticus in the last 12 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No change in medication in last 30 days
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of implanted electronic devices (e.g., pacemaker, medication pump, brain or vagus nerve stimulator, cochlear implant)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of intracranial metal (e.g., aneurysm clip)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to cooperate with non-sedated, navigated TMS testing
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
